articles.title: Questions swirl after bus aide allegedly assaults autistic student from Cambridge
articles.description:
After the alleged incident was caught on video, the aide was placed on leave while the DCF investigates.

The post Questions swirl after bus aide allegedly assaults autistic student from Cambridge appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bus aide allegedly assaulted an autistic student in Cambridge, incident captured on video.
Aide placed on leave as the Department of Children and Families investigates.
Incident raises concerns about student safety on school transportation in Boston.

articles.title: Patriots owner Robert Kraft named a semifinalist for 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame Class
articles.description:
Kraft has never made it past the semifinal round. He is, once again, up for consideration.

The post Patriots owner Robert Kraft named a semifinalist for 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame Class appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Robert Kraft named semifinalist for 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame Class.
Kraft has previously not advanced past the semifinal round.
Local fans hope this recognition boosts Kraft's chances for induction.

articles.title: Several police officials in Karen Read’s case faced scrutiny or discipline. Where are they now?
articles.description:
Fallout from Read’s high-profile case spread far beyond Dedham’s Norfolk Superior courthouse.

The post Several police officials in Karen Read’s case faced scrutiny or discipline. Where are they now? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Several police officials involved in Karen Read's case faced scrutiny and disciplinary actions.
Dedham's Norfolk Superior courthouse was central to the fallout from the high-profile case.
Local residents are concerned about police accountability and transparency in Boston.

articles.title: The full list of airports that will reduce flights during the government shutdown
articles.description:
The cuts will start to take effect on Friday.

The post The full list of airports that will reduce flights during the government shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Airports nationwide, including Boston Logan, will reduce flights starting Friday due to the government shutdown.
Boston Logan will see a significant decrease in flight availability affecting local travelers.
Residents should prepare for potential delays and cancellations as airlines adjust schedules.

articles.title: How Mike Vrabel, Patriots players reacted to lack of moves at trade deadline
articles.description:
The Patriots, who are poised for a playoff run, are focusing on the players they have instead of deadline deals.

The post How Mike Vrabel, Patriots players reacted to lack of moves at trade deadline appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots prioritize current roster over trade deadline moves for playoff push.
Coach Mike Vrabel emphasizes confidence in existing players as of November 6, 2025.
Local fans remain hopeful as team focuses on building chemistry for upcoming games.

articles.title: 5 best new restaurant openings and dining updates in Boston (Nov. 6, 2025)
articles.description:
Stay up to date on the best new restaurants, recent openings, and the biggest dining updates across Greater Boston's food scene.

summary: Discover five new restaurants opening in Boston as of November 6, 2025.

These openings enhance Boston's culinary diversity and support local job growth.
